name: @envl/oapack
description: A compound of frequently used utilities in js and comic styled React UI components

scripts.transpile: babel vallina-js/src -d vallina-js/dist --out-files &&babel dev-index.js --out-file index.js && cd oa-react && npm run transpile
scripts.pub: cd oa-react && npm run transpile && npm publish

author: GnimOay
